publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1085 Mike Pringle: MUMS Knows Best—That the Parliament congratulates Linda MacDonald from charity Malawi Underprivileged Mothers (MUMS) for raising £125,000 towards new equipment for Bottom Maternity Hospital in Lilongwe through selling her African cookbook for the second year in a row.
S3M-1085 MUMS Knows Best (lodged on 21 December 2007) Bill Kidd*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Jim Tolson*, Patrick Harvie*, Sandra White*, Elaine Smith*, Ross Finnie*

S3M-1085 MUMS Knows Best (lodged on 21 December 2007) Karen Gillon*, Bob Doris*, Stuart McMillan*, Sarah Boyack*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Alex Neil*, Elizabeth Smith*, Jim Hume*, Gil Paterson*, Trish Godman*
S3M-1085 MUMS Knows Best (lodged on 21 December 2007) John Scott*, Robin Harper*, Jamie Hepburn*, Jack McConnell*
S3M-1085 MUMS Knows Best (lodged on 21 December 2007) Hugh Henry*
S3M-1085 MUMS Knows Best (lodged on 21 December 2007) Joe FitzPatrick*
S3M-1085 MUMS Knows Best (lodged on 21 December 2007) Cathy Peattie*
S3M-1085 MUMS Knows Best (lodged on 21 December 2007) Aileen Campbell*
